page.title: 04TRANSPORT (Motorways)
page.content: The{M11}motorway runs north-south across this area. Further south it intersects with the{M25}London orbital motorway. A fortunate effect of the opening of these two roads (particularly the latter) has been a considerable decrease in heavy goods traffic in the North Weald area. It has, incidentally, resulted in the closure of the only transport cafe in North Weald. The presence of the M11 has probably been a blessing inasmuch as it forms a barrier to the further spread of Harlow New Town in this direction, saving North Weald from being swallowed up in urban expansion, a fate which has befallen a number of other villages in the Harlow area.
